## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G15660](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G15660)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATGRX4, GRX4, GRXS15</u>
- **Gene Name:** A. THALIANA GLUTAREDOXIN 4, glutaredoxin 4, glutaredoxin S15
- **Description:**   glutaredoxin 4;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2093297
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [grxs15-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Segregates for embryo lethality at around 23%.Early arrest at globular stage.
   - [grxs15-3]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Segregates around 20% for embryo lethal phenotype. Early globular arrest.
